General.Name: Shenyang Brilliant Elevator Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, installs, and sells elevators, escalators, moving walks, and accessories in China and internationally. It offers lift products, including machine room and roomless, panoramic, freight, bed, accessional, home, and high-speed elevators; traction machine products; and door machine and landing door products, and security components. The company also provides maintenance, supervision, remote monitoring, focus call center, and after-sale services. Its products are used in military special weapons and equipment, aeronautics and astronautics, watercrafts, rail transports, NEVs, mechanical sheet metal processing, and others. The company was formerly known as ShenYang Brilliant Elevator Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co.,Ltd in December 2015. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.
General.Address: Eco & Tech Dev Zn, Shenyang, China, 110027
